short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all instances of the word "cat" with "dog". Help Dogify the web!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dogify is a Chrome Browser Extension which when enabled, replaces all instances of the word "cat" on your websites with the much superior word "dog"! The Dogification process is enabled by default, but you can disable it at any time if you so wish! Privacy-wise, Dogify never stores any of your browsing data and just needs to read your pages to Dogify them!
